meanings.def: a service provided for the public, for example an electricity, water or gas supply
examples: Rescue teams worked desperately to restore utilities in the area shattered by the hurricane.
Legislation will be introduced to regulate the privatized utilities.
This information is of the highest utility to a historian.
He argued that the arts have great social utility.
This computer is of low utility for the home user.

meanings.def: a piece of computer software that performs a particular task
that can be used for several different purposes
examples: an all-round utility player (= one who can play equally well in several different positions in a sport)
